---
title: Diabetes Mellitus Type 2
---


# Pressure Ulcers

$\frac{1}{5}$ of individuals have risk of wound on feet w diabetes.
Once u have an amputation you are at inc risk of wounds.


Guidelines for treatment of diabetic ulcers

- Offloading
- Infection control
- Wound bed prep
- Dressings
- Surgery
- Adjuvant agents (topical, device, systemic)
- Prevention of recurrence



# Exercise Considerations

RCTs have shown that patients with neuropathy can perform WB exercise without increase risk of skin breakdown.

:::{.callout-note}
These studies used specific dosing during WB exercise.
:::
